iti41:2.1: “Te, bhikkhave, sattā suparihīnā ye ariyāya paññāya parihīnā.
iti41:2.2: Te diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhaṃ viharanti savighātaṃ saupāyāsaṃ sapariḷāhaṃ;
iti41:2.3: kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā duggati pāṭikaṅkhā.
iti41:2.4: Te, bhikkhave, sattā aparihīnā ye ariyāya paññāya aparihīnā.
iti41:2.5: Te diṭṭheva dhamme sukhaṃ viharanti avighātaṃ anupāyāsaṃ apariḷāhaṃ;
iti41:2.6: kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugati pāṭikaṅkhā”ti.
iti41:6.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
